main_definition: To exchange goods or services for money, typically by an agreement.

meanings_and_examples.example: The antique shop managed to sell all its valuable pieces.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Transferred ownership, typically by selling an item or property.
meanings_and_examples.example: She sold her car after finding another one she liked better.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To convince someone to purchase something through persuasive language.
meanings_and_examples.example: The salesperson did a great job of convincing the customer to buy the product.
